title: Corruption, wealth and beauty: The history of the Venetian gondola - Laura Morelli

options.label: B
options.text: It was used for transporting dignitaries, merchants, and goods through the city's canals.

options.label: C
options.text: It was used for warfare and defense.

options.text: It was used for recreational purposes only.

options.label: D

title: What if the Earth stopped spinning?

options.label: D
options.text: The Earth's protective magnetic field would cease to exist and we would be dosed with deadly amounts of ionising radiation from the Sun.

options.text: Extends up to several thousand kilometers above the Earth's surface

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D

title: What happens when you remove the hippocampus? - Sam Kean

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: B
options.text: Declarative memory refers to memories of skills and habits, while procedural memory refers to memories of facts and events

options.label: D
options.text: Declarative memory refers to memories that are consciously recalled, while procedural memory refers to memories that are unconsciously recalled

title: What can Schrödinger's cat teach us about quantum mechanics? - Josh Samani

multiple-choice.question: What type of physics governs the behavior of systems at small scales?

options.label: B
options.text: The cat will always be dead

options.label: C
options.text: The cat will be in a superposition state
